messages.title: It's Time For Change
messages.content: We are only days from an historic Election. The established parties have taken voters for granted and led them down. Too many politicians seem remote, untrustworthy, unaware of life in the 'real world' and disinterested in their constituents, so people want change.

issues.governance: Voting for UKIP will help bring about that much needed change.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am not a career politician, so why did I enter politics? The appalling expenses scandal of 2009 sparked my interest, but it was the...

politicalExperience.duration: In my 25-year service I held front-line training and headquarters roles, and retired as a Wing Commander.
politicalExperience.achievements: Served in the Royal Air Force, becoming a Tornado Navigator. I know why a commitment to spend 2% of GDP on Defence is important.

images.caption: Your UKIP Candidate for South West Norfolk Paul Smyth

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet content incomplete as the personal statement is cut off and key policies, election date, and other details are not fully visible.
